title: P3XL "PRE-ALARM" GOES OFF 2 HRS BEFORE SCHEDULED ALARM
content:
I'm awake at 4:45am because I set my alarm for 6:45am and I get an alarm (different sound than actual alarm) 2 hrs before my scheduled alarm time.  
I have to unlock the phone and as soon as I pull down the notification panel, the PRE-ALARM stops.

This has been since day 1, on all alarms, I have factory reset the phone a few times, and the issue persists.

What would make my alarm have an alarm?
